name: Safari Hunting 4x4 Offroad
description:
Do you have what it takes to be the worlds greates hunter?

Safari Hunting 4x4 Offroad is the best & most anticipated crocodile & deer hunting simulator game. It has animals crocodile, deer, boar elephant, rhinoceros ,lion ,lioness , tiger gazelle, brown bear & many more for you to hunt. But you have to be careful because wild jungle animals are not easy to hunt. For hunting jungle animals you will require best sniper guns . To become a master hunter,one must acquire properties like stealth, patience ,good aim & a perfect kill shot to bring down your hunt.

Safari Hunting 4x4 Offroad Hunt is a first person hunting simulation game that provides hunting adventure feeling. Drive wildest 4x4 safari jeeps and SUV to experience the extreme jungle hunting experience. Master your sniper shooting skills by hunting tigers, lions, crocodiles and rhinos etc.

Either hunt or be hunted. The decision is all yours.

Game Features
• Driving off road on luxury 4x4.
• Beautiful graphics and realistic scenery.
• Realistic animated animals to be hunted.
• Hunting animals.Best hunting simulator SAFARI 3D.
• Explore a vast jungle split into separate hunting reserves each filled with surprises.
• More than a dozen different wild animals including African Lions, Rhinos, Zebras and more.
• Bonus rewards for more precise sniping kills such as kill shot / head shot.
• Multiple types of Sniper rifles and Jeeps to choose from.
• Realistic Offroad Jeeps/Trucks and SUVs driving physics.
• Range of multiple unique hunting challenges using true-to-life hunting techniques.
• Realistic natural background effects and sounds.
